html:
5.18.18  6:17 am   Hi, I love the choir-like effect you sometimes do. How do you achieve it? Do you sing the same melody multiple times but in different pitches or you copy, paste and re-pitch your vocals digitally?

     i sing the lead, then sing the backups, human style. no pitch correction

5.18.18  5:26 am   Are you a verbal or as visual thinker?

     both, and more

5.18.18  5:24 am   when you're playing a chord with a weird voicing and you know for the next chord you're supposed to flat the 5th or sharp the 9th or whatever, how do you quickly figure out which finger you're supposed to move?

     i don't think about which fingers to move, i think about which notes to play. flat 5th means a tritone away from the letter name of the chord, sharp 9 is a minor third above the letter name of the chord

5.18.18  5:21 am   how do i find myself again?

     how did you do it last time

5.18.18  5:21 am   why dont you do more spiritual music?

     i'm making it as spiritual as i can

5.18.18  5:06 am   Have you ever experimented with dividing up the octave equally into a number other than 12 and composing with it?

     didn't get as far as composing, i hated it immediately

      If not, will you ever?

5.18.18  4:37 am   What's the best kind of sandwich?

     sandwich sandwich

5.18.18  3:52 am   what do you regularly think about?

     the current project

5.18.18  2:04 am   how to have motivation to live?

     who wants to know

5.18.18  1:14 am   What if I want to go to jail, but don't want to commit a crime?

     you could make your own jail

5.18.18  12:26 am   Show me knowledge

     i am trying

5.17.18  11:24 pm   Are you and Bill nye the science guy related?

     he is my parents

5.17.18  11:11 pm   what are your views on chairs?

     almost everything is chairs. stairs are chairs

5.17.18  10:55 pm   do you ever feel pressured to make videos that pander to a "weird" audience?

     no

5.17.18  10:36 pm   do you like long or short pants?

      how about medium

5.17.18  9:36 pm   What if you record a song, and there are several versions of the song (a different verse somewhere, different solo, alternate mix, etc.) and there's one version for every website you upload to, would that be a fun prank to pull?

      i am already recovering from the disease of wanting to do every possible different thing in every possible permutation of ways

5.17.18  9:10 pm   Have you ever experimented with microtones or microtonal music? 

      if you mean some kind of equally divided 24 tone scale, i would politely opt out. if you are talking about just using any pitch, like bends and slides, speech, noises, etc i would politely opt in but i don't think it would need such a fancy name if that is the case

5.17.18  8:43 pm   how can you tell if a tree is an aspen tree

     if it's white?

5.17.18  8:36 pm   I've been looking through the questions and your answers are answered in quite the consistent manner, time wise I mean.

     the time i answered the questions is not shown

      How do you do it?

     i answer several questions each day

      Do you even sleep?

     yes, it is one of my hobbies

5.17.18  8:24 pm   hey, your reality videos are great! but its been exactly 2 years since the last time you posted a reality video?

     that's not true, it's been 2 years since i posted the 1st. i posted everything from 2010 thru 2.2.16 on the same day (5.17.16) and then i posted a few more sometime in august 2017

      do you plan to do more or no more?

     i've been planning on doing those for many years, luckily i have managed to do some of them but it takes time away from making the better videos

5.17.18  7:43 pm   what is an example of something that frustrates you ?

     magnets, fuckin how do they work

5.17.18  7:38 pm   why is my face so ungentlemanlike

     perhaps you are a lady

5.17.18  7:30 pm   what does the number 240 mean

     2x2x2x2x3x5

5.17.18  7:26 pm   In and the day goes on is the salmon count with the sound accompanying them a reference to the salmons of capistrano?

     no

5.17.18  7:24 pm   will your LIFE be at 60 fps?

     probably more

5.17.18  7:15 pm   This quote was on a music help website:

"So the best way to start learning to play chords by ear isn't to dive in and start trying it with songs. It's to learn about how chord progressions work and which chords are the most frequently used - then do some dedicated ear training to recognise just those chords. This approach lets you very quickly develop a very useful ability level with this skill."

Do you agree with this?

     no. it's impossible for them to predict what music you are into. they might say 'these are the most common' but that's just from their perspective. everyone is living in a slightly different musical perspective, and has a slightly different comfort zone in terms of what music they are familiar with. i recommend learning the music you know. all music is good, and offers something to learn, and if you learn the music that made you like music, then everything is going to be fulfilling and meaningful

5.17.18  6:45 pm   When will you debut your shift/caps key?

      in every video i make, and also every day on the questions page

5.17.18  6:28 pm   recently re-visited your reality page. i thought it was quite interesting, was there a specific reason why you stopped?

     because i've been making other types of videos instead, which i couldn't make whilst i was doing the reality videos instead

5.17.18  6:22 pm   Would you like to subscribe to my weekly newsletter, Fat Benatar?

     yes

     You get a free photoshopped image of Pat Benatar made to look obese, every Wednesday!

      if i pay extra can i get it on tuesday

5.17.18  5:36 pm   what's the best fruit

     we will find out, in the upcoming fruit pageant

5.17.18  5:09 pm   Is life okay

     sure

5.17.18  5:08 pm   Why don't you caption your Instagram posts?

     i prefer to let the images do the talking

5.17.18  5:06 pm   how do stars work

      explosions

5.17.18  4:57 pm   do you care about the quadratic formula?

     sure

5.17.18  4:51 pm   what is a song you've been listening to a lot recently?

     the one i'm making

5.17.18  4:19 pm   thoughts on science fiction?

     some people think science is fiction

5.17.18  4:15 pm   what is the difference between talent and skill

     sounds like synonyms to me

5.17.18  3:38 pm   Do your chord progressions have much theory/influence behind them or do you play by your own rules of harmony?

      i'm just trying to be reasonable

5.17.18  3:14 pm   Does reality actually exist or are we all just a part of someone or something else's imagination?

     if it's in someone else's imagination then how did you find out about it

5.17.18  2:09 pm   what is poetry?

     fun with words

5.17.18  12:33 pm   The civil war was not civil.  The cold war was not cold.  Do we have a problem with war naming?

     i think the bigger problem could be the violence

5.17.18  12:29 pm   Having studied such a broad view of history in its entirety for HOTEWIG, was there any major takeaway/perspective change/revelation that you got out of the process?  Hope all is well.  Thanks 

     it strongly re-enforced the idea that we are on some kind of exponential curve

5.17.18  12:24 pm   Are questions actually the answer?

     they are the gateway to answers

5.17.18  12:19 pm   thoughts on vr technologies?

     helpful, and useful

5.17.18  12:12 pm   What is best in life

     you

5.17.18  11:26 am   whats the most important question ever asked?

     what

5.17.18  9:59 am   Is there a way to be pregant with aliens

     that would be pretty cool

5.17.18  9:58 am   What do plants eat

     light

5.17.18  9:46 am   Did you ever accidentally start World War 3.

     yes but it's over now. i won and lost it at the same time

5.17.18  9:34 am   What does life mean to you?

     it's pretty neat
